extension.summary: Automatic turn on and off a projector.
extension.description:
From Kodi, control a projector connected via a serial port. Currently support Epson and InFocus projectors.
* Start/shutdown projector at kodi start/exit * Start/shutdown projector at Kodi screensaver activation/deactivation * Set input source when projector starts * Automatically update media library while the projector is off * Optional REST API to control the projector from any networked device.
If your projector is not supported, please create a github issue on https://github.com/fredrik-eriksson/kodi_projcontrol with link to the projector API documentation.
